page.title: 04Life Styles (Drighlington)
page.content: A fairly affluent area.The approximate age is 20-25 years bedroomed valued at between Â£28000 and Â£30000 with a RV of Â£189.The gardens are well stocked and well looked after.Most households own a car 89% (and a garage) and a small proportion own two vehicles 14%. Approximately half the families have two parents working.The predominant kinds of employment for men are skilled manual workers and White Collar Workers.Many women are cleaners or have jobs in the kitchens at one of the Schools in this area.{ { {Drighlington}is a suburb of Leeds with three distinct areas which many locals adher to- Drigh.,Adwalton & Netherton. Once a village with a strong Community Spirit the gradual conversion to a dormitory town is destroying this. There is a distinct
